mapper.select: SELECT fotId, name,t_fastorderteacher.phone,teachingCourse,teachingCourseName,t_fastorderteacher.wxNumber,orderPrice, IFNULL(t_fastorderteacher.teacherId,'') teacherId,IFNULL(teacherName,'') teacherName,IFNULL(remark,'') remark,state,publicTime,ip FROM t_fastorderteacher LEFT JOIN t_teacher ON t_fastorderteacher.teacherId=t_teacher.teacherId

SELECT fotId, name,t_fastorderteacher.phone,teachingCourse,teachingCourseName,t_fastorderteacher.wxNumber,orderPrice, IFNULL(t_fastorderteacher.teacherId,'') teacherId,IFNULL(teacherName,'') teacherName,IFNULL(remark,'') remark,state,publicTime,ip FROM t_fastorderteacher LEFT JOIN t_teacher ON t_fastorderteacher.teacherId=t_teacher.teacherId Where fotId=#{0};

SELECT fotId, name,t_fastorderteacher.phone,teachingCourse,teachingCourseName,t_fastorderteacher.wxNumber,orderPrice, IFNULL(t_fastorderteacher.teacherId,'') teacherId,IFNULL(teacherName,'') teacherName,IFNULL(remark,'') remark,state,publicTime,ip FROM t_fastorderteacher LEFT JOIN t_teacher ON t_fastorderteacher.teacherId=t_teacher.teacherId WHERE t_fastorderteacher.teacherId=#{0} ORDER BY t_fastorderteacher.publicTime DESC;
